txt.en:
This hastily scribbled note details instructions for the goblins. 

'Take the western passage to the crag, then turn north and follow the narrow passage. At the end of the passage is small cave opening. Wait for a messenger from Rohan to pass near the cave opening. Capture him and take anything that he carries.'

You should take this note to Ardwyn in Forthbrond.
'This note disturbs me greatly, for it is written in the hand and tongue of Men.\n\n'I fear that one of our allies has fallen under the influence of our enemies.'
You found a hastily scribbled note, ordering the goblins to watch for a Rohirrim messenger.
Bring the note to Ardwyn at Forthbrond
Ardwyn is at Forthbrond, south and east of Cadthorn's position.\n\nYou should bring the note you recovered to Ardwyn.
